remarks: A projective map value is zero iff its argument is lattice zero. (Contributed by NM, 27-Jan-2012.)
statement:
pmapeq0.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
pmapeq0.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
pmapeq0.m $e |- M = ( pmap ` K ) $.
pmapeq0 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) -> ( ( M ` X ) = (/) <-> X = .0. ) ) $.
